_header: Be peace ye make me spill my ale
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 244; cf. also 393.
Subjects: dialogues, lovers’; lovers, dialogues; women, as speakers/narrators
_description: An amorous flyting, a dialogue between a wooer and a lady — three 8-line stanzas
